exclusion: Put your HUB in Exclusion mode and press the Config Button (A) 3x until your HUB says the device is excluded.
inclusion: Start the Inclusion process on your HUB/Gateway. Turn the power back on and auto-inclusion will activate.You will have 60 seconds before it times out. If it does timeout,the backup method to pair/include the device is to press the Config Button (A) 3 times.
label: LZW31
overview:
For starters, we’ve upgraded our Z-Wave module for better distance. The switch can be used in any 3-Way or 4-Way setting and allows you to use either an auxiliary switch, a smart switch or your existing dumb switch (NOTE: this only applies if a neutral wire is installed. If there is no neutral wire, the switch only works in a single-pole setting).

Lastly, the LED bar can be changed to any default color you’d prefer and also allows for it to be dimmed, or disabled altogether.

category.label: Wall Switch
category.description: Any device attached to the wall that controls a binary status of something, for ex. a light switch

channels.name: config_decimal
channels.label: Light LED Color
channels.overview: This is the color of the Light LED strip represented as part of the HUE color wheel. Since the wheel has 360 values and this parameter only has 255, the following equation can be used to determine the color: value/255 * 360 = Hue color wheel value

channels.name: config_decimal
channels.label: LED Indicator Intensity
channels.overview:
This will set the intensity of the LED bar

0=Off, 1=low, 5=medium, 10=high

channels.name: config_decimal
channels.label: LED Indicator Intensity (when off)
channels.overview:
LED Indicator intensity when light is off

0=off , 1 =low, 10=high

channels.name: config_decimal
channels.label: Auto Off Timer (Seconds)
channels.overview: Auto off timer in seconds. 0 to disable, max 32767

parameters.label: Dimming Speed
parameters.description: How fast or slow the light turns on when you hold the switch
parameters.overview:
How fast or slow the lights turns on when you hold the switch ( ie: dimming from 10-20%, 80-60%, etc)

0 = instant on, 1=1 second, 100=100 seconds

parameters.label: Dimming Speed ( Z-wave )
parameters.description: How fast or slow the light turns dim when you adjust via network
parameters.overview:
How fast or slow the light turns dim when you adjust the switch remotely.

(ie: dimming from 10-20%, 80-60%, etc)

0= instant on, 1=1 second, 100=100 seconds, 101=keep in sync with Parameter 1

parameters.label: Ramp Rate
parameters.description: How fast or slow the light turns on when you press the switch
parameters.overview:
How fast or slow the light turns on when you press the switch 1x to bring from ON to OFF or OFF to ON

0=instant on, 1=1 second, 100=100 seconds, 101=keep in sync with Parameter 1

parameters.label: Ramp Rate ( Z-wave)
parameters.description: How fast or slow the light turns on / off via the network
parameters.overview:
How fast or slow the light turns on when you turn the switch ON to OFF or OFF to ON remotely.

0=instant on, 1=1 second, 100=100 seconds, 101=keep in sync with Parameter 1

parameters.label: Minimum Dim Level
parameters.description: Minimum level the light switch will dim to
parameters.overview:
Minimum level the light switch will dim to (great for fixing flickering bulbs).

1=1%, 45=45%

parameters.label: Maximum Dim Level
parameters.description: Maximum level the light switch will dim to
parameters.overview:
Maximum level the light switch will dim to.

55%=55%, 100=100%

parameters.label: Invert Switch
parameters.overview:
Inverts the switch ( tap down = ON, tap up = OFF)

0 = disabled, 1 = enabled

parameters.label: Auto Off Timer
parameters.description: Automatically tuns the switch off after X seconds
parameters.overview:
Automatically turns the switch off after x amount of seconds

0 = disabled, 1 = 1 second, 32767 = 32767 seconds.

parameters.label: Default Level ( Local )
parameters.description: Default dim level when pressed locally
parameters.overview:
Default dim level for the switch when pressed locally

0 = Switch will return to the level it was prior to being off, 1=1%, 100=100%

parameters.label: Default level ( Z-Wave )
parameters.description: Default dim level when switch on via network
parameters.overview:
Default dim level for the switch when powered on via a Z-Wave command

0 = Switch will return to level it was prior to being off, 1=1%, 100=100%

parameters.label: Power On State
parameters.description: When power is restored switch reverts On/Off/Last
parameters.overview:
When power is restored, the switch reverts to either On, Off, or Last Level

0=Off, 1-100= specific % On, 101= returns to level before power outage

parameters.label: Association Behavior
parameters.description: When should the switch send commands to associated devices
parameters.overview:
01=local, 02=3-way, 03=3-way & local, 04=Z-wave hub, 05=Z-wave Hub & local

06=Z-wave hub & 3-way, 07=Z-wave hub & local & 3-way, 08=timer, 09= timer &local

10=timer & 3-way, 11=timer & 3-way & local, 12= timer & z-wave hub

13= timer & z-wave hub & local, 14=timer & z-wave hub & 3-way, 15= ALL

parameters.label: LED Indicator Color
parameters.description: Sets the default color of the LED bar
parameters.overview:
This will set the default color of the LED bar

Calculated by using a hue color circle ( value / 255*360) see website for more detail

parameters.label: LED Indicator Intensity
parameters.description: Sets the intensity of the LED bar (brightness)
parameters.overview:
This will set the intensity of the LED bar

0=Off, 1=low, 5=medium, 10=high

parameters.label: LED Indicator Intensity (when off)
parameters.description: LED Indicator brightness when switch is off
parameters.overview:
LED Indicator intensity when light is off

0=off , 1 =low, 10=high

parameters.label: LED Strip Effect
parameters.description: Add sweet effects to the LED bar
parameters.overview:
Sweet effects: pulse, chase, solid, etc

Byte 1 = choose color

Byte 2 = Choose Brightness Level

Byte 3 = Choose Effect

Byte 4 = Duration 

See Website for details

parameters.label: LED timeout
parameters.overview:
Changes the amount of time the RGB bar shows the dim level if the LED bar has been disabled

0=always off, 1=1 second after level is adjusted, 10=10 seconds after level is adjusted

parameters.label: AC Power Type
parameters.overview:
Select whether you are wiring your switch with or without a neutral wire

0 = No-Neutral, 1 = Neutral

parameters.label: Switch Type
parameters.overview:
Select what type of installation you have

0 = Single-Pole (ie: one switch), 1 = Multi-Switch (Dumb Switch), 2 = Multi-Switch (Auxillary Switch)

associations.label: Control multiple bulbs / dimmers with level change
